se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.spi.jaxb

Class JaxbXmlBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.spi.jaxb.JaxbXmlBinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlBinder<Object>

    public class JaxbXmlBinder
extends Object
implements XmlBinder<Object>
    JAXB implementation of the XmlBinder specification. Must extend the JAXB NamespacePrefixMapper class due to poor JAXB design.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.api.XmlBinder

        CORE_NAMESPACE, XSD_INSTANCE_NAMESPACE, XSD_NAMESPACE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JaxbXmlBinder() 
      JaxbXmlBinder(JaxbNamespacePrefixResolver namespacePrefixResolver)
      Compound constructor, creating a JAXB-flavoured XmlBinder instance which uses the provided TypeConverterRegistry to convert inbound types to and from JAXB-annotated transport types during transport, and the provided JaxbNamespacePrefixResolver to resolve JAXB namespaces and prefixes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NamespacePrefixResolver getNamespacePrefixResolver()
      Retrieves the NamespacePrefixResolver instance in use by this XmlBinder.
      String marshal(Object... toConvert)
      Converts the provided source java objects to an XML formatted String.
      List<Object> unmarshal(Reader transportReader)
      Reads the XML formatted string from the provided transportReader, and resurrects the object graph found within the transportReader.
      <S> S unmarshalInstance(Reader transportReader)
      Convenience unmarshal method which acquires a single object instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JaxbXmlBinder

        public JaxbXmlBinder()

      • JaxbXmlBinder

        public JaxbXmlBinder(JaxbNamespacePrefixResolver namespacePrefixResolver)
        Compound constructor, creating a JAXB-flavoured XmlBinder instance which uses the provided TypeConverterRegistry to convert inbound types to and from JAXB-annotated transport types during transport, and the provided JaxbNamespacePrefixResolver to resolve JAXB namespaces and prefixes.
        Parameters:
        namespacePrefixResolver - The JAXB-implemented NamespacePrefixResolver which is also a JAXB NamespacePrefixMapper. Use the NamespacePrefixResolver API to affect its operation.

    • Method Detail

      • getNamespacePrefixResolver

        public final NamespacePrefixResolver getNamespacePrefixResolver()
        Retrieves the NamespacePrefixResolver instance in use by this XmlBinder.
        Specified by:
        getNamespacePrefixResolver in interface XmlBinder<Object>
        Returns:
        the NamespacePrefixResolver instance in use by this XmlBinder, or null should no NamespacePrefixResolver be used by this XmlBinder.

      • marshal

        public String marshal(Object... toConvert)
               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                      se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException
        Converts the provided source java objects to an XML formatted String. Order between the provided objects is preserved in the resulting XML.
        Specified by:
        marshal in interface XmlBinder<Object>
        Parameters:
        toConvert - The java objects to convert to an XML formatted String.
        Returns:
        An XML representation of the provided javaObjects.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the conversion could not be completed successfully.
        se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException - if the Java Object Graph contained Validatable objects that did not pass validation.

      • unmarshal

        public List<Object> unmarshal(Reader transportReader)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException,
                              se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException
        Reads the XML formatted string from the provided transportReader, and resurrects the object graph found within the transportReader.
        Specified by:
        unmarshal in interface XmlBinder<Object>
        Parameters:
        transportReader - The Reader holding a single XML-formatted String being converted by the marshal method in an XmlBinder of the same internal implementation as this one.
        Returns:
        A fully unmarshalled List holding clones of the original objects written to the stream.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the object graph could not be properly resurrected.
        se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException - if any object resurrected was a Validatable which did not pass validation.

      • unmarshalInstance

        public <S> S unmarshalInstance(Reader transportReader)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException,
                               se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException
        Convenience unmarshal method which acquires a single object instance. Reads the XML formatted string from the provided transportReader, and resurrects the object found within the transportReader.
        Specified by:
        unmarshalInstance in interface XmlBinder<Object>
        Type Parameters:
        S - The instance type to return.
        Parameters:
        transportReader - The Reader holding a single XML-formatted String being converted by the marshal method in an XmlBinder of the same internal implementation type as this one.
        Returns:
        A fully unmarshalled instance clone of the original object written to the stream.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the object graph could not be properly resurrected.
        se.jguru.nazgul.tools.validation.api.exception.InternalStateValidationException - if any object resurrected was a Validatable which did not pass validation.
